title: Hot Summer, Hotter Sex

description:
On today’s show, Emily is giving you sexy summer tips on how to properly have sex in the water and she’s answering your calls & emails.

She gives advice on what to do when your body is too tense during sex to even orgasm, ways to know if ending a relationship is the right thing to do, & how to have sex when the kids are always around. 

Thank you for supporting our sponsors who help keep the show FREE: pjur, Manscaped, Same Day STD Testing, SiriusXM, Magic Wand. 

Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily

For even more sex talk, tips, & tricks visit sexwithemily.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
